HollowMod:DashSlash.NAME: Dash Slash
HollowMod:DashSlash.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Dash NL Deal !D! Damage. NL Gain !B! Block.

HollowMod:FastStrike.NAME: Fast Strike
HollowMod:FastStrike.DESCRIPTION: Discard 1 card. Deal !D! Damage and apply 1 Vulnerable to !M! random enemies.

HollowMod:HeavyBlow.NAME: Heavy Blow
HollowMod:HeavyBlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage and apply !M! Weak to an enemy.

HollowMod:HowlingWraiths.NAME: Howling Wraiths
HollowMod:HowlingWraiths.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Spell NL hollowmod:Focus !HollowMod:focusCost!: Deal !D! Damage to all enemies.

HollowMod:InfectedAttack.NAME: Infected Attack
HollowMod:InfectedAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Apply !M! Poison. NL hollowmod:Infection 2.

HollowMod:RecoilStrike.NAME: Recoil Strike
HollowMod:RecoilStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Return [#60CFFF]Dash card from your discard pile to hand.
HollowMod:RecoilStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Return a [#60CFFF]Dash card from your discard pile to hand. It costs 1 Less [E] this turn.

HollowMod:SoulStrike.NAME: Soul Strike
HollowMod:SoulStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Gain !M! Additional hollowmod:Soul

HollowMod:VengefulVoid.NAME: Vengeful Void
HollowMod:VengefulVoid.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Spell NL hollowmod:Void 2: Deal !D! Damage to a single enemy !M! times. Exhaust.

HollowMod:WraithStrike.NAME: Wraith Strike
HollowMod:WraithStrike.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Spell NL hollowmod:Void 1: Deal !D! Damage and Apply !M! Weak to an enemy.

HollowMod:ChannelNail.NAME: Channel Nail
HollowMod:ChannelNail.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Spell NL hollowmod:Focus 3: Next turn, gain [E] and Draw 1 Extra Card. Exhaust.
HollowMod:ChannelNail.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Spell NL hollowmod:Focus 3: Next turn, gain [E] and Draw 1 Extra Card.

HollowMod:CloakDash.NAME: Cloak Dash
HollowMod:CloakDash.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Dash NL Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! Cards. Exhaust.

HollowMod:CornifersMap.NAME: Cornifer's Map
HollowMod:CornifersMap.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Ally NL Shuffle a card from your Discard into your Deck, Discard a Card. Both cards are upgraded for the rest of this combat.

HollowMod:DoubleDash.NAME: Double Dash
HollowMod:DoubleDash.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Dash NL Gain !B! Block this turn, and !M! Block next turn.

HollowMod:LifebloodCocoon.NAME: Lifeblood Cocoon
HollowMod:LifebloodCocoon.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Temporary HP each time you attack an enemy this turn.

HollowMod:SoulSplash.NAME: Soul Splash
HollowMod:SoulSplash.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Spell NL hollowmod:Focus 2: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, Draw a card.

HollowMod:TaintedHusks.NAME: Tainted Husks
HollowMod:TaintedHusks.DESCRIPTION: Applies !HollowMod:SecondMagic! Poison to !M! Random Enemies. NL hollowmod:Infection 3.

HollowMod:AbyssShriek.NAME: Abyss Shriek
HollowMod:AbyssShriek.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Spell NL hollowmod:Void 2: Deal !D! Damage to ALL Enemies. NL You cannot play any more Attack cards this turn.

HollowMod:CoiledNail.NAME: Coiled Nail
HollowMod:CoiledNail.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to an enemy. NL If the enemy is Vulnerable, Repeat this effect.

HollowMod:DescendingDark.NAME: Descending Dark
HollowMod:DescendingDark.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Spell NL hollowmod:Void 2: Deals !D! Damage to ALL Enemies. Exhaust.

HollowMod:DesolateDive.NAME: Desolate Dive
HollowMod:DesolateDive.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Spell NL hollowmod:Focus 4: Deal !D! Damage to ALL Enemies.

HollowMod:FallenFury.NAME: Fury of the Fallen
HollowMod:FallenFury.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to an enemy. NL If you are below 25% HP, Deal !M! times that amount instead.

HollowMod:GreatSlash.NAME: Great Slash
HollowMod:GreatSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to ALL Enemies !M! times.

HollowMod:InfectedCysts.NAME: Infected Cysts
HollowMod:InfectedCysts.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage and apply !M! Poison to all enemies. NL hollowmod:Infection 3. Exhaust

HollowMod:InfectionAssault.NAME: Infection Assault
HollowMod:InfectionAssault.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage, plus an additional !M! damage for every level of hollowmod:Infection.

HollowMod:PureNailStrike.NAME: Pure Nail Strike
HollowMod:PureNailStrike.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Spell NL hollowmod:Focus X: Deal !D! Damage to an enemy, plus an additional !M! damage for each hollowmod:Soul Spent

HollowMod:QuirrelsAssistance.NAME: Quirrel's Assistance
HollowMod:QuirrelsAssistance.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Ally NL A Random Enemy Gains Weak !M!. NL A Random Enemy Takes !D! Damage.

HollowMod:SharpenedNail.NAME: Sharpened Nail
HollowMod:SharpenedNail.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to an Enemy. NL If the enemy is Weak, Deal the same Damage to ALL other enemies.

HollowMod:VengefulSpirit.NAME: Vengeful Spirit
HollowMod:VengefulSpirit.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Spell NL hollowmod:Focus !HollowMod:focusCost!: Deal !D! Damage to an enemy.

HollowMod:BaldurShell.NAME: Baldur Shell
HollowMod:BaldurShell.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Whenever you hollowmod:Focus, Gain !M! Block.

HollowMod:BrokenVessel.NAME: Broken Vessel
HollowMod:BrokenVessel.DESCRIPTION: When you take Damage from hollowmod:Infection, Deal that same Damage to ALL Enemies as well.
HollowMod:BrokenVessel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate, When you take Damage from hollowmod:Infection, Deal that same Damage to ALL Enemies as well.

HollowMod:Flukenest.NAME: Flukenest
HollowMod:Flukenest.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a [#60CFFF]Spell: Deal 1 Damage to !M! Random Enemies

HollowMod:Grubsong.NAME: Grubsong
HollowMod:Grubsong.DESCRIPTION: The first time you take Damage each turn, Gain 1 hollowmod:Soul.
HollowMod:Grubsong.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The first !M! times you take Damage each turn, Gain 1 hollowmod:Soul.

HollowMod:MothsMistake.NAME: Moth's Mistake
HollowMod:MothsMistake.DESCRIPTION: At the Start of Each Turn: apply !M! Poison to all enemies, and gain 1 hollowmod:Infection.

HollowMod:ShapeofUnn.NAME: Shape of Unn
HollowMod:ShapeofUnn.DESCRIPTION: When you play a [#60CFFF]Spell, Place 1 [#60CFFF]Dash card in your Discard into your Hand.

HollowMod:SoulEater.NAME: Soul Eater
HollowMod:SoulEater.DESCRIPTION: When you play an Attack card, Generate 1 Additional hollowmod:Soul (Doesn't work for [#60CFFF]Spell or [#60CFFF]Ally cards

HollowMod:SoulVessel.NAME: Soul Vessel
HollowMod:SoulVessel.DESCRIPTION: Increase the Soul Meter Limit by !M! this Combat.

HollowMod:ConfessorsAdvice.NAME: Confessor's Advice
HollowMod:ConfessorsAdvice.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Ally NL Play the top card of your deck, add a copy of it to your discard pile.
HollowMod:ConfessorsAdvice.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Ally NL Play the top card of your deck, add 2 copies of it to your discard pile.

HollowMod:CrystalDash.NAME: Crystal Dash
HollowMod:CrystalDash.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Dash NL Discard your hand and gain !B! Block for each card discarded.

HollowMod:DreamGate.NAME: Dream Gate
HollowMod:DreamGate.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a Card, The next card you play is returned to your hand. Exhaust
HollowMod:DreamGate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a Card, The next 2 cards you play are returned to your hand. Exhaust

HollowMod:DungDefenderAura.NAME: Dung Defender's Aura
HollowMod:DungDefenderAura.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block, Apply !M! poison to Any Enemy who attacks you this turn.

HollowMod:EmbracetheVoid.NAME: Embrace the Void
HollowMod:EmbracetheVoid.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 [E] Less for each hollowmod:Void. Draw Cards until you draw a hollowmod:Void or draw 5 cards. Exhaust
HollowMod:EmbracetheVoid.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 [E] Less for each hollowmod:Void. Draw Cards until you draw a hollowmod:Void or draw 5 cards.

HollowMod:GrimmsGift.NAME: Grimm's Gift
HollowMod:GrimmsGift.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF] NL Each time you damage an enemy this turn, apply #b1 Vulnerable to them.

HollowMod:LifebloodHeart.NAME: Lifeblood Heart
HollowMod:LifebloodHeart.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Temporary Health, If you take no unblocked Damage this Turn, Repeat this effect next Turn. Exhaust.

HollowMod:MonarchWings.NAME: Monarch Wings
HollowMod:MonarchWings.DESCRIPTION: For the next !M! Turns,  Double the Block of any [#60CFFF]Dash Cards. Exhaust.

HollowMod:Overcharmed.NAME: Overcharmed
HollowMod:Overcharmed.DESCRIPTION: Lose 6 HP. Gain !M! Strength until the end of the turn.

HollowMod:PaleKingsBlessing.NAME: Pale King's Blessing
HollowMod:PaleKingsBlessing.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal NL Exhaust 2 Cards. Gain !M! hollowmod:Soul. Gain 1 [E]. Exhaust.

HollowMod:PerfectDash.NAME: Perfect Dash
HollowMod:PerfectDash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Dash NL Gain 1 Intangible. Gain !B! Block. Exhaust.

HollowMod:SporeShroom.NAME: Spore Shroom
HollowMod:SporeShroom.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Spell NL hollowmod:Focus 3: Discard up to 3 Cards. Heal 2 HP and Apply 1 Poison to all enemies for each Card Discarded. Exhaust.

HollowMod:WhiteLadysBlessing.NAME: White Lady's Blessing
HollowMod:WhiteLadysBlessing.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal NL hollowmod:Focus !M!: Heal 3, Draw 2 Cards. Discard 1 Card. Exhaust.

HollowMod:AwokenDreamNail.NAME: Awoken Dream Nail
HollowMod:AwokenDreamNail.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Increase the Soul Meter Limit by 1 for this combat, and fill your Soul Meter

HollowMod:HornetsHelp.NAME: Hornet's Help
HollowMod:HornetsHelp.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Ally NL Deal X damage to a random enemy X times and gain X block.
HollowMod:HornetsHelp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Ally NL Deal X+1 damage to a random enemy X+1 times and gain X+1 block.

HollowMod:MantisClaw.NAME: Mantis Claw
HollowMod:MantisClaw.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 3 Cards in your hand. Draw 1 Card and Deal !D! Damage to a single enemy for each card Exhausted. Exhaust.

HollowMod:ZotesMagnificence.NAME: Zote's Magnificence
HollowMod:ZotesMagnificence.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Ally NL Deal !D! Damage, at the cost of all your Current Block. Exhaust

HollowMod:ElderbugsWisdom.NAME: Elderbug's Wisdom
HollowMod:ElderbugsWisdom.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Ally NL Whenever you play an [#60CFFF]Ally Card, Draw 1 Card.

HollowMod:LordofShades.NAME: Lord of Shades
HollowMod:LordofShades.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal NL Võid !M!: While hollowmod:Void is Active: 50% of all Block you gain is instead gained as Thorn. All Thorn is reduced by half at the end of each turn.

HollowMod:SharpenedShadows.NAME: Sharpened Shadows
HollowMod:SharpenedShadows.DESCRIPTION: While you have hollowmod:Void: Playing a [#60CFFF]Dash Card will deal !M! Damage to a random enemy.

HollowMod:SlysStrikes.NAME: Sly's Strikes
HollowMod:SlysStrikes.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Ally, Ethereal NL Gain 1 Strength at the beginning of each turn.
HollowMod:SlysStrikes.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Ally NL Gain 1 Strength at the beginning of each turn.

HollowMod:SoulMaster.NAME: Soul Master
HollowMod:SoulMaster.DESCRIPTION: hollowmod:Soul [#60CFFF]Spells cost 1 less hollowmod:Soul. NL hollowmod:Void [#60CFFF]Spells generate 1 more hollowmod:Void.
HollowMod:SoulMaster.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate NL hollowmod:Soul [#60CFFF]Spells cost 1 less hollowmod:Soul. NL hollowmod:Void [#60CFFF]Spells generate 1 more hollowmod:Void.

HollowMod:Weaversong.NAME: Weaversong
HollowMod:Weaversong.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Play an Attack: Deal !M! Damage to a random enemy.

HollowMod:Hiveblood.NAME: Hiveblood
HollowMod:Hiveblood.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. Gain half that amount as Regen. Exhaust.

HollowMod:LifebloodCore.NAME: Lifeblood Core
HollowMod:LifebloodCore.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal NL Gain 2 Temporary HP for each current point of Block. Lose all Block. Exhaust
HollowMod:LifebloodCore.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Temporary HP for each current point of Block. Lose all Block. Exhaust

HollowMod:RadiancesLament.NAME: Radiance's Lament
HollowMod:RadiancesLament.DESCRIPTION: Return all [#FFA200]Infection cards from your Discard and Exhaust Piles to your hand. hollowmod:Infection Cards played this turn cost 1 [E] Less and are Exhausted.
HollowMod:RadiancesLament.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain, Return all hollowmod:Infection cards from your Discard and Exhaust Piles to your hand. hollowmod:Infection Cards played this turn cost 1 [E] Less and are Exhausted.

HollowMod:SiblingsSouls.NAME: Sibling's Souls
HollowMod:SiblingsSouls.DESCRIPTION: Add a Copy of the next played attack or skill card to your hand.

HollowMod:theNailsmith.NAME: The Nailsmith
HollowMod:theNailsmith.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Ally NL Each Time a Non [#60CFFF]Spell attack is used this turn: Upgrade it for the rest of the combat.

HollowMod:VoidDash.NAME: Void Dash
HollowMod:VoidDash.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Dash NL hollowmod:Void 1: Gain !B! Block, Deal !M! Damage to any enemy who's attacks you block this turn.

HollowMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
HollowMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

HollowMod:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
HollowMod:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
HollowMod:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

HollowMod:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
HollowMod:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

HollowMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
HollowMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal damage total.)

HollowMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
HollowMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !HollowMod:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
